Text: i got the 40gb jukebox zen xtra for christmas .  so , i 've had it for a month , and the headphone jack went out .  i called creative and they said to send it in and they would decide if it in warranty .  it 'll take 10-15 business days for them to decide form when they get it .  nothing but hassle with this company .  what kind of product goes out within a month ?
